author: jerenkrantz
msg: Follow up to 1120: do not try to remove the socket from the pollset when we
are being cleaned up.  (Doing so causes a crash with Mac OS X.  Yummy.)
(clean_skt): Do not remove the socket from the pollset on pool cleanup.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Fix segfault with epoll when removing a NULL socket.
(clean_skt): Always call remove_connection before clearing the socket.
(update_pollset): Do not attempt to give pollset a NULL socket to delete.

author: ivan
msg: (parser_thread): Move variable declaration to top of a block.

author: ivan
msg: Follow-up to r1113: Reset OpenSSL thread-safety callbacks when
apr_terminate() called. Otherwise serf crashes on application exit
(init_ssl_libraries): Register pool cleanup callback in ssl_pool.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Send current version string in the test programs (Issue 21)
